About us
Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., LTD with 25 years experience is the most professional enterprise of electric hair care products in eastern Guangdong province, integrating R&D, manufacture and sales. The main products include hair dryer, hair straightener, hair clippers, air cleaner, lint remover, electric kettle etc. under brand KANGFU/CONFU, With great passion and professional effort for years, our brand KANGFU/CONFU products has found its way into every family successfully, and exported to Europe, South America, North America, Middle East and other 40 countries.
In 2005, our brand KANGFU has obtained the GUANGDONG FAMOUS TRADE MARK and registered in Italy, England, France, USA and other 31 countries successively.
We also manufacture universal motor, permanent magnet motor and induction motor under brand HENGXIANG.
We obtained ISO9001 and ISO14000 certificate. Most of products have the approvals of ROHS/CE/GS/ETL/SASO/CCC etc, delivering confidence and reliability to the consumers from all over the world.

results.title: Guangdong HUANENGDA Electric Appliance Co., Ltd
results.content: The main products include personal care appliances such as hair dryers, hair clips, and hair clippers; household appliances such as dryers, hair ball trimmers, and air purifiers.
results.raw_content:
CN
'CONFU' is the main brand of Guangdong Huanengda Electric Co., Ltd., with a history of 28 years. The main products include personal care appliances such as hair dryers, hair clips, and hair clippers; household appliances such as dryers, hair ball trimmers, and air purifiers. As an old national brand, 'CONFU' has made a recognized contribution to the development of my country's hair dryer industry, and it is also the pioneer of 'Made in China' going abroad!
As a member of the National Household Appliance Standards Committee, he has participated in the formulation and revision of industry standards many times over the years. At the same time, it has built a national-level CNAS-certified laboratory, has a number of domestic and foreign patents, and has been rated as 'National Intellectual Property Advantage Enterprise', 'National High-tech Enterprise' and other advanced technology enterprises. The products have passed national '3C' certification, German 'CE' and 'GS' certification, US 'ETL' certification and EU ROHS certification. It has registered trademarks in 31 countries including Italy, Britain, France, and the United States, and is a 'registered supplier of the European Information Center', and its products are exported to more than 50 countries and regions.
In 2013, 'CONFU' won the title of 'National High-tech Enterprise'
Won the honorary title of 'Guangdong Province Intellectual Property Advantage Enterprise' in 2018
In 2019, won the honorary title of 'National Intellectual Property Advantage Enterprise'
In 2018, the company passed the 'Intellectual Property Management System' certification
1997 officially registered the 'CONFU' brand, taking the first step towards a leading brand route in the hairdressing industry.
In 2003, CONFU's leading industry completed trademark registrations in 31 countries around the world and passed multiple national certifications. It passed the German 'CE' and 'GS' certification, the US 'ETL' certification and the European ROHS certification, leading Chinese hairdressing brands to enter the overseas market.
In 2005, Hengxiang Company was established, which enabled our R&D and manufacturing to be completed independently, and became the brand with the most complete independent supply in the global hair dryer production chain.
In 2011, CONFU successfully held the first Global Dealer Summit, which was highly praised by many dealers and attracted the attention of many people in the industry. 142.2 mu of newly acquired land. On the day of the groundbreaking ceremony,
The start of construction was announced by the mayor of Jieyang City Chen Dong, and from then on, CONFU entered a new development stage of modern technological production level.
In 2014, under the e-commerce trend of national online shopping, 'Jieyang CONFU E-commerce Company' was formally established. CONFU hair dryer achieved a historic breakthrough in the sales of the whole network and reached the top 3 in the national e-commerce field.
In 2016, the second 'CONFU Global Distributor Summit' was held in the Yasuo Auditorium. Guests from all over the world visited Yasuo to witness Yasuo's prosperous demeanor.

Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., LTD with 20 years experience is the most professional enterprise of electric hair care products in eastern Guangdong province, integrating R&D, manufacture and sales. The company and its subsidiary ...
Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., LTD with 20 years experience is the most professional enterprise of electric hair care products in eastern Guangdong province, integrating R&D, manufacture and sales. The company and its subsidiary company Hengxiang Electrical Appliances Co., LTD are in Jieyang city, situated in the core traffic position of eastern Guangdong. It is only 10 km from the companies to Jieyang Chaoshan Airport and Chaoshan High-speed Rail station.
With great passion and professional effort for years, our brand KANGFU/CONFU products has found its way into every family successfully, and are exported to Europe, South America, North America, Middle East and other 40 countries and regions. In 2005, our brand KANGFU/CONFU have obtained the GUANGDONG FAMOUS TRADE MARK and registered in Italy, England, France, USA and other 31countries successively.
Electric hair care products and other small household appliances make up our growing list of products, such as hair dryer, hair straightener, hair clippers, lint remover, lady shaver, electric kettle, air cleaner, fan heater etc. under brand KANGFU/CONFU. Besides, we also manufacture universal motor, permanent magnet motor, induction motor, hair dryer, and hair straightener under brand HENGXIANG.
Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., LTD, with its subsidiary and plant areas over 160 thousand square meters, has more than 2000 employees, including more than 40 R&D engineers and 60 QC engineers.
The company has passed ISO9001 and ISO14000. Most of products have the approvals of ROHS/CE/GS/ETL/SASO/CCC etc., delivering confidence and reliability to the consumers from all over the world.
High-quality products, timely delivery together with our advanced management philosophy, Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., LTD is and will continuously providing more excellent products and satisfied services to our customers and consumers.

results.title: Get Silky Smooth Hair with Guangdong Huanengda's New Professional ...
results.content: Confu "Little White Shark" hair dryer by Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd. is essentially a styling tool that every salon (and household) should have. Breaking through the cumbersome and rigid design of traditional hair dryers, it comes with a sleek and streamlined design featuring a narrow front and a wide rear, with a gray ...
results.raw_content:
Get Silky Smooth Hair with Guangdong Huanengda's New Professional Styling Tool "Little White Shark" at Cosmoprof Asia Digital Week
HONG KONG, Nov. 5, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- Guangdong Huanengda showcases their new professional styling tool "Little White Shark" at Cosmoprof Asia Digital Week, from 9th to 13th November. Hair styling tools are essential items in the hair salon, helping people to create their favourite looks. A hair styling tool can, quite literally, make or break people's hair. So, it's worth every effort to look for quality tools that can give people amazing hair.
Brushless motor ensure this hair dryer with around 6,000 hours using time, durable and suitable for hair salon use.
Little white shark with new design and technology-Stepless switch provide no level limited speed and LCD display below air temperature
Confu "Little White Shark" hair dryer by Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd. is essentially a styling tool that every salon (and household) should have. Breaking through the cumbersome and rigid design of traditional hair dryers, it comes with a sleek and streamlined design featuring a narrow front and a wide rear, with a gray metal ring in the middle of the body integrated with the handle.
With a smart temperature control and display system, one can easily select the temperature that suits one's hair texture. It also emits negative ions to protect and smoothen hair cuticles and reduce static electricity, resulting in hair that is silky smooth. Also, its fan speed can be adjusted according to one's preference. The hair dryer is available in two sizes. The compact size is very popular in Europe, Korea, and Japan etc.
About Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd
Founded in 1993, Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd is a leading manufacturer of hair salon appliances in China. Their main products are hair dryers, hair curlers, hair straighteners, hair clippers and other small home appliances. The company has customers from more than 50 countries, including Iran, Saudi Arabia, USA, Colombia, Italy and Spain.
Located in Jieyang, Guangdong, China, the company has 2000 employees. It has the international ISO 9001:2008 quality assurance certification as well as the ISO 14001 Environmental Certificate. Almost all its products have obtained the CE/ROHS/CB approval for the European market and the UL/ETL approval for the American market. The company is committed to meet their customers' needs for high-quality, exquisite products, with the aim that every family in the world will own a Confu product one day.
About Cosmoprof Asia Digital Week
Cosmoprof Asia, the leading B2B international beauty trade show in the region, is committed to empowering exhibitors to achieve their ambitious business goals via online channels including virtual platform and product showroom, website, social media and e-newsletters during these challenging times. Join us for 5 days of connectivity and content at Cosmoprof Asia Digital Week where we will offer you the tools needed to stay ahead of the curve and succeed in the beauty industry. Register now to schedule a meeting with Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances on 9-13 November on our virtual platform.
For enquiries about Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances, please contact:
Nicole WeiSales Manager Tel: (+86) 13822027918Email: nicole@kangfuchina.com
Website: http://www.kangfuchina.com

CONFU
Guangdong Huanengda Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd
The mark consists of the stylized word "CONFU".
Mark For: CONFU® trademark registration is intended to cover the categories of air-conditioning installations; Air filtering installations; Air purifying apparatus and machines; Air sterilisers; Electric air deodorizing apparatus; Electric hair dryers; Electric kettles; Electric rice cooker; Fabric steamers; Hair driers; Hair steamers for beauty salon use; Heat guns; Laundry dryers, electric; Microwave ovens; Refrigerators; Touchless hand drying apparatus; Electric hand drying apparatus for washrooms; Electric soymilk makers; Electronic facial steamers; Filaments for electric lamps; Hand-held electric hair dryers; Heating installations.

results.raw_content:
Power Distribution Unit
WHERE RELIABILITY IS DEMANDED AND SAFETY IS PARAMOUNT
Our next generation PDU incorporates a smarter design to help exceed today’s complex electrical distribution requirements. The engineering excellence you expect from Anord Mardix has created a system of power distribution to maintain operations even under the most arduous situations. Each is designed and built for critical applications where reliability is demanded and safety is paramount.
We work with you to meet exacting requirements and our reduced footprint designs allow increased space for vital equipment without compromising functionality. Anord Mardix PDUs can be designed to fit along a wall or at the end of data cabinets and racks for maximum flexibility and access.
The Anord Mardix PDU also offers unrivalled flexibility in relation to the level of redundancy and resilience required, as we can configure for single or dual incoming supplies.
KEY FEATURES
SMART BENEFITS
Specification

We’ve begun to document the journey with our clients, old and new, and release regular updates about completed projects on our Projects page.
